name: Productivity Tools & Insights
what_you_do: Rashelle Isip, The Order Expert®, is a New York City-based productivity coach and consultant who helps successful entrepreneurs improve their relationship with productivity, shifting their perspective from hustle and grind to ease and flow.
who_you_serve: The target audience includes successful entrepreneurs who feel overwhelmed and are seeking to regain control over their productivity and work-life balance.
signature_programs: Empty Inbox™, Trim Your Daily To-Do List™, Work Notebook Workshop™, Calendar Printables™
